studyAmendmentImpacts.description: Updated protocol to reflect most recent guidance for treating study participants with nivolumab and added exploratory objective.
Addressed minor inconsistencies in study objectives and endpoints.
Changed Overall Response Rate (ORR) from a co-primary objective to a secondary objective.
Changed co-primary endpoint from time to progression (TTP) to objective response rate (ORR).
Clarified Hepatitis D testing options for local vs central labs.

studyAmendmentReasons.reasonText: Reflect most recent guidance for treating study participants with nivolumab
Evaluating the correlation of tumor inflammation with efficacy based on recent preliminary data
Re-prioritization of study endpoints to make Overall Survival (OS) the sole primary endpoint

studyChanges.beforeText: Overall Response Rate (ORR) as a co-primary objective
studyChanges.afterText: Overall Response Rate (ORR) as a secondary objective; Overall Survival (OS) as the sole Primary Endpoint
studyChanges.summary: Downgraded ORR from co-primary to secondary endpoint.

studyChanges.afterText: Exploratory objective evaluating the correlation of tumor inflammation with efficacy
studyChanges.summary: Added new exploratory objective based on preliminary data.

studyChanges.afterText: Requirement for confirmatory scan to be performed for CR/PR assessment of best overall response (BOR)
studyChanges.summary: Added requirement for confirmatory scans for response assessment.

studyChanges.afterText: Reduction of frequency of HCV RNA testing for HCV infected subjects
studyChanges.summary: Decreased frequency of HCV RNA monitoring.

studyChanges.afterText: Management algorithms updated per revised nivolumab IB
studyChanges.summary: Updated safety management algorithms to align with the latest Investigator Brochure.
